yo-doublelist


nav list
content list

示例描述：

<div class="yo-doublelist"> <div class="item"> nav list </div> <div class="item"> content list </div> </div> 
@include yo-doublelist(
    $name:default, //{String} 扩展的名称
    $aside-width:default, //{Length} 侧边栏宽度
    $aside-order:default //{Integer} 侧边栏顺序
)
